problem.markdown:
>>1.If the reflection co-effecient is zero an osmotic membrane is :<< (x) None ( ) Partially permeable ( ) Impermeable ( ) Fully permeable
>>2.Which of the following membrane is used for dehydration of alcohol :<< ( ) Cross linked PVA (x) Cellulose acetate ( ) Polycarbonate ( ) None
>>3.With increasing membrane thickness selectivity of membrane:<< ( ) Remains unchanged ( ) Decreases (x) Increases ( ) Can't Say
